name: Daniel St. Pierre
narrative: Decedent not to be at the residence, possibly armed
threats: Make suicidal attempts, Resist being handcuffed or arrested, Attempt to grab, hit, or kick officers
law_action: Fight or struggle with decedent, Physically restrain decedent
final_death_place: Dead on arrival at medical facility
autopsy: THC, five opiates including morphine
notes: With regard to threatening suicide, Mr. St. Pierre did not make any specific statements to the officers. He had, however, been threatening suicide to his mother the night before and morning of this incident. In addition, in the garage, officers located St. Pierre's vehicle, which had a rubber hose attached to the tail pipe with duct tape. The hose went inside the passenger compartment via the rear driver's side window, where it was secured in place with duct tape.
